Package graphicslib3D

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICamera
    ICamera specifies the interface to be implemented by a "UVN" camera.
    IQuarterPatch
    This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by classes in order to be editable by the "QuarterPatchDialog" class.
    ISurfacePatch
    This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by classes in order to be editable by the "SurfacePatchDialog" class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    Camera provides an implementation of the ICamera interface using the JOGL Java interface to OpenGL.
    CameraSettingsDialog
    This class provides a graphical component for keeping track of camera setting values (location, look-at point, and up-direction) interactively.
    ControlMesh
    This class defines a 4x4 array of "control points" -- Point3D objects which represent the control points for a cubic Bezier surface.
    DisplaySettingsDialog
    This class provides a dialog box for specifying display settings.
    GeometryTransformPipeline
    This class manages a set of global ModelView and Projection MatrixStacks comprising the geometry transformation pipeline.
    GLSLUtils
    This class defines a set of static utility methods useful when manipulating GLSL shader programs in a JOGL OpenGL environment, including routines to read shader source from a file, fetch and print shader and shader program information logs, and check for OpenGL errors.
    Material
    This class encapsulates the material parameters of Materials in OpenGL.
    Matrix3D
    Defines a 3D (4x4) matrix for general transformations.
    MatrixInvert
    This class is a helper class supporting the Matrix3D class; it is not intended to be used directly.
    MatrixStack
    This class defines a Stack for managing hierarchical collections of Matrix3D transformations.
    Noise
    This class implements a noise generator in the manner originally defined by Perlin.
    NormalizationCubeMap
    This class defines a normalization cube map; that is, a set of six data arrays suitable for defining a Cube Map Texture such that indexing the texture with a vector V= [x y z] returns a texel whose RGB components are the normalized equivalent of V.
    Point3D
    Defines a three-dimensional homogeneous point.
    Polygon3D
    Defines a 3D polygon which includes a Vertex list and Plane Coefficients.
    Quaternion
    This class defines a quaternion -- an object representing an orientation in space.
    Shape3D
    Defines the abstract base class from which 3D shapes are derived.
    Vector3D
    Defines a three-dimensional vector.
    Vertex3D
    Defines a 3D vertex.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Shape3D.DRAW_MODE
    The choices for how the displayed object should look.
    Shape3D.RENDER_METHOD
    The choices for the underlying hardware method which should be used to to draw the object.
